name: GravityGolf (dasPanjo)
description:
Do you ever wanted to play golf but either don't have the right equipment? Or do you have the equipment, but it's raining all day long?

Then download Gravity Golf. 

Gravity Golf is a 2D golf game you can play on your smartphone. It's perfect to play at work, while you are waiting or just if you want to have fun! Try to put the ball into the hole and avoid the traps that are on the way.
